meanings.definition: Capable of being arranged or ordered.
meanings.sent1: The books on the shelf are sortable by size.
meanings.sent2: The alphabet is a sortable way to organize words.
meanings.sent3: The sortable puzzle pieces made it easy to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like a sortable list, neatly organized and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The sortable buttons on the website allowed users to customize their experience.
